meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stubborn.
meanings.sent1: Her stubbornness made it difficult to change her mind.
meanings.sent2: His stubbornness caused him to refuse any help.
meanings.sent3: Despite his stubbornness, he eventually agreed to try the new restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The stubbornness of the old tree roots made it hard to remove them from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The stubbornness of the toddler was evident in her refusal to wear anything but her favorite shoes.

meanings.definition: The act of being unreasonably or perversely unyielding.
meanings.sent1: Their stubbornness in negotiations led to a stalemate.
meanings.sent2: The stubbornness of the mule made it impossible to move.
meanings.sent3: The stubbornness of the cat refusing to eat anything but tuna was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The stubbornness of the storm clouds refusing to move on brought heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The stubbornness of the lock in refusing to open delayed their arrival.
